page.title: 12Fireman's Family
page.content: My name is Kerry Hannington I am 10 years old. My father works for Colt Cars Cirencester, but he has been a part-time{Fireman}at{Malmesbury {Fire Station}for 12 years. I think my dad is very brave,but I do not worry very much about him only if he does not come home for a long time. My brother Paul says he likes dad being in the Fire Brigade because it is exciting. None of the Malmesbury firemen have been killed but my dad was hospitalised once with heat exhaustion.Mum worried for the first few years but has now put it to the back of her mind.Sometimes she gets annoyed when arrangements have to be cancelled. Once my dad was called out just as he was eating his{Christmas dinner.Mum feels proud to have a husband in the Fire Brigade and the service he is providing for others.
